definition: ossicles (in the middle ear)/also written 聽小骨|听小骨
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
chain of ossicles (in the middle ear)

sentences.english: Lesion of ossicular chain is a common ear disease impairing the sense of hearing.
sentences.chinese: 聽骨鏈病變是導致患者聽力水平下降的普遍病症。

sentences.english: Ossiculoplasty can steadily improve hearing postoperatively in most cases.
sentences.chinese: 採用聽骨成形術可以有效地改善聽力。

sentences.english: Methods The ossicular reconstruction of 6 patients who suffered from middle conductive hearing loss were operated by the endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法用耳內鏡爲6例傳導性耳聾患者重建聽骨鏈。

sentences.english: To study morphologic changes of ear ossicles and auditory ossicular chain of patients with conductive deafness.
sentences.chinese: 明確傳導性耳聾的聽小骨及聽骨鏈的形態學改變。

sentences.english: The technique type choice should also e pick Sichuan to the auditory bone chain operation as far as possible few methods.
sentences.chinese: 術式選擇也應盡峨採川對聽骨鏈操作儘可能少的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To explore diagnosis and therapy of traumatic ossicular chain disruption.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外傷性聽骨鏈中斷的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Objective To look for an new operated method of the ossicular reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲聽骨鏈重建術尋找一種新的手術方法。
